meanings.definition: The action of representing or the state of being represented.
meanings.sent1: Her drawing was a clear representation of the tree outside.
meanings.sent2: The painting was a beautiful representation of the artist's emotions.
meanings.sent3: The representation of the cat wearing sunglasses in the book made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His music was a powerful representation of the struggles he faced in life.
meanings.sent5: The sculpture was a lifelike representation of a famous historical figure.

meanings.definition: A statement or account made to influence opinion or action.
meanings.sent1: The advertisement was a clever representation of the new product.
meanings.sent2: His speech was a persuasive representation of his beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The exaggerated representation of the fisherman's catch made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her story was a poignant representation of the challenges she overcame.
meanings.sent5: The documentary was a compelling representation of the impact of climate change.

meanings.definition: A person or group acting on behalf of another.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer was a dedicated representation for her client in court.
meanings.sent2: The ambassador was an effective representation of his country's interests.
meanings.sent3: The representation of the superhero at the party delighted all the children.
meanings.sent4: The mentor was a guiding representation for the new employees.
meanings.sent5: The actor was a convincing representation of the historical figure in the movie.
